articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.title: WhatsApp rolls out voice message transcripts - TechCrunch
articles.description: WhatsApp announced on Thursday that it's rolling out voice message transcripts to let users read voice messages.
articles.content: WhatsApp announced on Thursday it’s rolling out voice message transcripts. The Meta-owned company says the new feature will come in handy when you’re on the move or in a loud place where you can’t li… [+1519 chars]
